item.description:
Lets start gathering around 6:45, the movie is playing at 7:20 PM. We will want to head in by 7 to get seats.

To find me, check out my picture on the web site and I will be wearing a Boston Movie Group Badge. It looks like the movie is upstairs, so I will try to grab a table near the windows at the top of the escalator.

Movie Details:

Director: Shawn Levy
Screenwriter: Josh Klausner
Starring: Steve Carell, Tina Fey, Mark Wahlberg, James Franco, Leighton Meester, Common, Taraji Henson, Kristen Wiig, Ray Liotta, Mila Kunis, Mark Ruffalo, William Fichtner, Olivia Munn
Official Website:
http://www.datenight-...

Plot Summary: Steve Carell and Tina Fey are set to play a married couple in "Date Night." The story follows a couple who find their routine date night becomes much more than just dinner and a movie. Wahlberg plays a successful and crazily buff securities expert who flirts with Fey's character. Franco portrays a not-too-bright con man and petty criminal. Meester is onboard as the couple's babysitter. Henson plays the one good cop who believes the couple is in danger, and Common portrays a villain. Wiig rounds out the cast as the actress' best friend.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Boston Movie Badge. I will be near windows near the escalator upstairs, if movie is upstairs. Or near the ropes by the concession stand if movie is downstairs.
item.name: Date Night
